title: What's Up at Upstate | What's Up at Upstate | SUNY Upstate Medical University
cleaned_text: What's Up at Upstate Category: Spiritual Care How to brighten your life September 15, 2017 Up Close images: Raising awareness about cancer March 24, 2017 Books to nurture the spirit February 3, 2017 Hands-on relief: Reiki can prompt relaxation along the road to recovery June 3, 2016 Black History ceremony features new president, honors Black National Anthem February 3, 2016 An audience with the pope reverberates at Upstate December 11, 2015 10 musts for cancer patients: What to consider after diagnosis November 4, 2015 A sacred space to say goodbye June 10, 2015 Finding the virtue in medical practice June 9, 2015 Talking about caring in 'Schwartz Rounds' January 16, 2015 Chaplain interns graduation ceremony at noon in Interfaith Chapel April 18, 2013
